pkgmetadata.longdescription: Activity Index Calculation using Raw 'Accelerometry' Data // Reads raw 'accelerometry' from 'GT3X+' data and plain table data to calculate Activity Index from 'Bai et al.' (2016) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0160644. The Activity Index refers to the square root of the second-level average variance of the three 'accelerometry' axes.
